title: Best car manufacturers based on build quality in Great Britain ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Automobile Manufacturers in the x axis and Percentage score in the y axis.
The maximum Percentage score 94.27 is found at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and the minimum is found at Toyota where Automobile Manufacturers is 88.85.
Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has 1.06 times more Percentage score than Automobile Manufacturers Toyota which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Automobile Manufacturers, and Percentage score in each Automobile Manufacturers on the y axis.
The maximum Percentage score 94.27 is found at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and the minimum is found at Toyota where Automobile Manufacturers is 88.85.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Automobile Manufacturers in the x axis and Percentage score in the y axis.
The maximum Percentage score 94.27 is found at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and the minimum is found at Toyota where Automobile Manufacturers is 88.85.

max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Automobile Manufacturers, and Percentage score in each Automobile Manufacturers on the y axis.
The Percentage score is appeared to be the highest at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and lowest at Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.
The second highest Percentage score is appeared to be the Automobile Manufacturers Porsche.
The highest Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has 5.42 more Percentage score than the lowest Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.
Percentage score at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus is 94.27 , second place is Porsche at 94.02, and thirdly is Audi at 93.42.
The Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has 1.03 times more Percentage score than average.
